title: Three's Company
description: Angela and Mia are live-in lesbian lovers. Lately, though, Angela has been craving the physical attentions of a man more and more, missing the kind on intimacy that only a male and female can share. She talks Mia into having a threesome with a hunky guy from work. When gorgeous Mark joins them for some three way action, the girls soon get a pleasant reminder of just what they've been missing. Adults only 18+
author: Darren G. Burton
